content.question: The Unionâ€™s victory at Gettysburg was significant because it

choices.label: prevented Britain and Russia from intervening in the Civil War
prompted Abraham Lincoln to issue the Emancipation Proclamation
halted the last major Confederate invasion of the North
gave the Union control over the Mississippi River

content.answer: halted the last major Confederate invasion of the North

topic.text: 5.8: Military Conflict in the Civil War
